text: The Jeep Avenger is a Subcompact Crossover SUV made by Jeep since 2023. == History and Features == The Jeep Avenger was shown in September 2022 and one month later in October it was shown again at the Paris Auto Show. its bulit on the Common Modular plataform that is shared with the Peugeot 2008 Opel Mokka and the DS 3 Crosaback. the SUV has a 1.2 liter petrol engine with a 6-speed manual transmission also it has a mild hybrid version and has a electric version that was launched before the petrol version in many countries its the only version of the Avenger the electric version has a electric motor made by EMotors that has 115kW (154 hp) and has a range of 400 km (250 mi) (but its 550 km 340 mi in urban cycle only.) and a 6-speed e-DCT transmission. a four- wheel-drive with a off road looks called the Avenger 4xe.(also known by some people as the Avenger 4x4) was shown at the Paris Motor Show in October 2022. the production version was launched in February 2024 it has a mild hybrid system. == Markets == The Jeep Avenger is currently sold mainly in Europe the SUV is planned to be sold also in Brazil Turkey Morocco South Korea and Japan and is not sold in the United States Canada and China. == References == Category:Jeep vehicles Category:Sport utility vehicles Category:2020s automobiles
title: Jeep Avenger
